content.raw:
> Specifying record and playback at the same time is not allowed

I think  this is fine for now, but in the future we may want to support that. On Gazebo classic it was possible to run them at the same time to crop the original recording, or change its encoding for example.

> Only small caveat is that, in the case that the recorded file uses ogre2, the playback appears brighter, because the default SDF in Server.cc uses ogre.

Yeah that's an unfortunate caveat right now, ideally we'd be using the `<gui>` from the world being played back (#17).
content.html:
Specifying record and playback at the same time is not allowed

I think this is fine for now, but in the future we may want to support that. On Gazebo classic it was possible to run them at the same time to crop the original recording, or change its encoding for example.

Only small caveat is that, in the case that the recorded file uses ogre2, the playback appears brighter, because the default SDF in Server.cc uses ogre.

Yeah that's an unfortunate caveat right now, ideally we'd be using the <gui> from the world being played back (#17).
